nodes.text: A Night at Tosche Station was a web enhancement for Star Wars Roleplaying Game published on Wizards.com on June 21, 2001.

A group of Rebels, planning to meet a smuggler with a batch of blaster rifles, are stuck inside Tatooine's Tosche Station during one of the worst sandstorms in years. The eclectic group of beings trapped with them includes a group of Imperial stormtroopers waiting out the storm.
